mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT o.id AS order_id, o.kiosk_id, m.name AS menu_name, o.menu_count, o.is_completed, o.regdate FROM orders o JOIN menu m ON o.menu_id = m.id ) WHERE order_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (id,menu_id, menu_count, kiosk_id, is_completed,regdate) VALUES(#{id},#{menu_id},#{menu_count},#{kiosk_id},'false',SYSDATE)
